attributes.additional_details:
In order to preserve the United Kingdom to its members that equally receive benefits and share a common interest in being part of the United Kingdom we need to be given the choice to vote to oust Scotland from this partnership, to long have they received a increase in taxes per head of the population  and constantly maintained there position as a separate country.

As the British population widely embraces Scottish sports stars such as Andy Murray or Scottish counterparts have always supported any team other than England, the time has now come to either fully embrace our Island or remove those from the partnership that have constantly maintained that they do not want to be pay of it.

I suggest Scotland does not decide what they want and we in the rest of the UK vote on whether we want them with us, to long have er stood ideally by with out making the choice for our selves.
